comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content:
@ cardwellpics - don't be too sure!

Not a lot of takers for "Palmer's Mystery Hike No.1";  but what they lacked in quantity was made up for in quality.

I imagine that is Mr Palmer (at left), Mrs Palmer (seated on the running board, looking [ahem] "Adorable"], their son "Jacko", and four of the Palmer daughters - the fifth is behind the camera.

Several of these old photos have signs for "Hot Water" presumably to make tea.  Was it usual to carry tea leaves, milk, sugar, mugs etc.?   Something you do not see any more.

comment.author: 9134056@N05
comment._content:
Thanks, beachcomber,
It  just  conjured  up the image in my mind ! as they look SO happy ! !
 Look forward for further uploads from  ' The Powerhouse '
